item.description:
Please join us for the first of our skill building events! Learn the basics of making bread using a sourdough culture and how to keep that culture growing for years. This will be a three hour meeting.

Starting around 1:00 we will shape bread dough into loaves.
While the dough is rising you will learn the stages of building the dough and how to maintain your sourdough culture. At about 2:30 the bread will be ready to bake.
Bread will be ready to go before 4:00 in time to enjoy with your Sunday dinner!

You will leave with a new and ancient knowledge, a loaf of bread and your very own sourdough culture to use at home.

Please bring a quart jar for your sourdough culture and a snack to share with the group.

There is a $5 fee to cover the cost of ingredients in the bread and culture.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal who opens the door
item.name: Sourdough Workshop- Cultivate a Culture
